description: Roof extension to rear (main) roofslope; part rear roof extension to rear outrigger roofslope; removal of chimney; installation of two roof lights to front roofslope and one rooflight to proposed outrigger roof extension
decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended). | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing numbers: Site Location Plan, Block/Site Plan, DWG01 Rev A Existing & Proposed Elevations, DWG02 Rev A Existing & Proposed Elevations, DWG03 Rev A Existing Floor Plans, DWG04 Rev A Proposed Floor Plans, DWG05 Rev A Proposed Section, DWG06 Rev A Proposed Second Floor Plan.

Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning. | The materials to be used for the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing, unless where stated on either the submitted application form or the drawings / plans as listed in Condition (2).

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with Policies 7.4 & 7.6 of the London Plan (2016) and Policies 7.4 and 7B of Adopted Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013), polices 1.1 (k) and 1.2 (f) of the Adopted Development (Core) Strategy (2012). | The proposed rooflights hereby approved shall not project more than 150mm from the roof plane and retained as such for the lifetime of the development.

Reason: To minimise light spillage and interference with the privacy and outlook of adjoining occupiers and in the interests of good neighbourliness and in accordance with policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013).
